300ct bag of mixed zircons from Harts Range, NT—featuring a colorful assortment of natural stones in various shapes and sizes with unique inclusions. Perfect for skin polishing and lapidary practice.
145ct bag of mixed zircons from Harts Range, NT—featuring a variety of colors, shapes, sizes, and natural inclusions. Although small, some stones are suitable for faceting and lapidary work.
1200ct bag of amethyst crystals from WA—featuring a beautiful mix of purple shades. Ideal as display pieces or for decorative use; not suitable for faceting.
1000ct bag of amethyst from WA—comprised of crystals in various shapes, sizes, and shades ranging from clear quartz to deep purple and black. Ideal for display or decorative use.
Beautiful 100ct smoky quartz crystal from Mooralla, Vic—featuring well-defined crystal structure. An outstanding display piece for any collection.
Mixed 1000ct bulk bag of cubic zirconia—featuring a variety of random colors and sizes from our range. Perfect for faceting practice and bulk savings.
Mixed 300ct bulk bag of synthetic spinel rough—featuring a variety of colors and sizes from our range. Perfect for faceting practice and bulk savings.

Thunder egg agate slice from Agate Creek, QLD featuring swirls of vivid red and small crystalline sections. Comes unpolished

Discover the excitement of fossicking at home with our compact Sapphire Washbags, each 1kg or less. Filled with genuine sapphire wash from the Queensland Gemfields, every  bag offers a hands-on gem hunting experience and contains a bonus cut sapphire.
Single large unopened Yowah Nut (501-1000ct) from the Queensland opal fields—crack it open for a chance at discovering precious opal inside. Perfect for those who love the thrill of the unknown.

Pack of 3 medium unopened Yowah Nuts (150-500ct each) from the Queensland opal fields—increase your chances of discovering precious opal. Great value for those who love the thrill of the hunt.
Pack of 3 small unopened Yowah Nuts (≤150ct each) from the Queensland opal fields—increase your chances of discovering precious opal. Great value for those who love the thrill of the hunt.

Single extra large unopened Yowah Nut (1001-1750ct) from the Queensland opal fields—crack it open for a chance at discovering precious opal inside. Perfect for those who love the thrill of the unknown.
100g bag of Quartz tumbles, ranging from milky white to clear. Perfect for collectors and craft enthusiasts.
100g bag of Amethyst tumbles, showcasing beautiful purple hues from pale lilac to deep violet. Ideal for display collections and wire-wrapping projects.
Colourful Agate tumbles available in 100g bags, displaying natural banded patterns in earthy tones and vibrant colors. Great for jewelry making and decorative arts.
100g of Herkimer Diamonds; an exceptional variety of quartz from Herkimer County in New York known for its unique crystal structure.
